definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: spear, lance (etym. unknown; Aram. [[רוּמְחָא]], rumh.o0; Ar. rumh.un; Eth. ramh.:);—oft. +[[חֶרֶב]], [[חִנׇּה]], [[מָגֵן]], [[קֶשֶׁת]], etc.;—abs. ´[[ר]]: Ju Jdg 5:8, Nu 25:7 (P), Ez Eze 39:9, 1Ch 12:9, 1Ch 12:25 (van d. H. v:8, v:24), 2Ch 14:7, 2Ch 25:5; pl. [[רְמָחִים]] 1Ki 18:28, Je 46:4, Jn 4:10, Ne 4:10, Ne 4:15, 2Ch 11:12, 2Ch 26:14; sf. [[רָמְחֵיהֶם]] Ne 4:7.
